basics.name: Blake Dolin
basics.label: Threat model includes printers.
basics.summary: Lifelong IT nerd and tinkerer with a strong background in troubleshooting complex issues under pressure. Experienced across the stack, from hardware and software to servers and network, handling end-to-end problem solving. So lazy I write code to do all my work for me. Obsessed with security; they're never getting my blue party hat. I maintain an extensive home lab environment that I only occasionally consider setting on fire.

work.name: ONEOK
work.position: Systems Analyst II - Application Infrastructure Services
work.summary: As a Windows Administrator, I support a diverse range of Application Development teams in meeting business goals. My responsibilities include managing core services such as DNS, Certificate Management, and Active Directory/Authentication. I work closely with InfoSec to deploy and manage cybersecurity infrastructure and tools. Additionally, I assist Application teams in developing CI/CD pipelines using various automation platforms, including Ansible, Salt, Gitlab, and more. I also develop and provide accurate reporting using enterprise monitoring tools like Splunk and Tenable.

work.name: Hummingbird.Tech
work.summary: Expertly manages and maintains all internal software tools used to efficiently run business operations and support clients. Acts as lead technical escalation point for helpdesk, providing quick and effective resolutions to technical issues. Demonstrates strong leadership and management skills by actively participating in key business decisions and effectively communicating technical issues to non-technical stakeholders. Utilizes expert knowledge in the field to identify areas for improvement and implement changes to increase overall efficiency and productivity, including developing automation workflows to streamline processes and reduce errors.

work.name: SageNet
work.summary: Senior engineer overseeing a team responsible for installation and verification of all equipment rollouts company-wide. Working closely with network engineering and automation teams, helped to drive custom automation integrations to create a 'single pane of glass' for installation support technicians. Primary administrator for ZenDesk ticketing system. Implemented custom python scripting for management of TeamViewer, SolarWinds, Meraki, and other platforms via API. Creation and maintenance of rollout documentation. Worked with internal resources in the development and delivery of in-depth training programs for onboarding employees.

work.name: SageNet
work.summary: Managed network equipment configuration across various vendors, including Cisco, Meraki, Fortinet, HPE/Aruba, Alcatel-Lucent, and many others. HP and Lenovo certified warranty repair technician providing repair service for both in-house and client-owned end-user devices and server equipment. Implementation of custom PC imaging and configuration solution which increases the throughput of configurations by 2000%. Creation and ongoing maintenance of documentation around all processes.

work.name: SageNet
work.summary: Configuration, Monitoring, and Management of an industry-leading Digital Signage deployment across over three thousand active sites. Providing around-the-clock support for Digital Signage as lead engineer for escalation. Administration of business-critical applications such as AD, Internal Ticketing and Inventory systems, and core network services.

work.name: Twotrees Technologies, LLC
work.summary: Independent field engineer providing a wide range of IT services to K-12 school districts in North-East Oklahoma for a Wichita, KS-based IT services company. Installation, configuration, and management of network, server, and end-user equipment. Troubleshooting and resolution of trouble tickets utilizing remote-support techniques where possible to improve ticket resolution times. Consistently improved customer relations and satisfaction ratings through increased efficiency in problem resolution and effectively communicating technical issues and future growth needs with administration.

work.name: University of Oklahoma - Information Technology
work.summary: Call-center and in-person-based tech support the entire OU community, computer repair and software maintenance, use of IT management and data recovery software, troubleshooting, and diagnosis of Apple devices using specialized tools and equipment. Extensive Apple troubleshooting experience.

certificates.name: Cisco Certified Network Associate Routing and Switching (CCNA)
